Reviews.Title: suck
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: These wires are as thin as spaghetti noodles don't waste your time buying!!!! Spend a little more money and get something better

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality and super fast delivery..........
Reviews.Author: Jerry Hoffman
Reviews.Content: Am well satisfied in all respects.....Was surprised at the speedy delivery...Actually expected it to take several days longer for delivery...Was able to upgrade my system quickly with these parts...Keep up the good work.....

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: Just what I ordered.  The Masione 4 Pack 100ft security camera bnc video power cable extension wire came on time and works great.

Reviews.Title: Security cable wire
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Just received these cable wires and they are very well built. I have had other wire from a different company and they were very thin and to delicate to use they tore right apart. These are much more thicker than anticipated.

Reviews.Title: Very thin weak poor quality cables
Reviews.Author: Ben Y.
Reviews.Content: These cable is not worth $1.00, do not waste your time for these cables. I am not sure what others have used in the past, but this product is poor quality! Very thin cable. Stopped working after 10 minutes after installation. I think that the cable is so thin and poor quality. I do not recommend these cables.

ProductInfo.Features:
4x 100 feet video and power security camera cable
The black cable is made of pure copper and of good quality
2.1mm center positive power connection type
Transmit video signals and supply DC power for security camera
For camera with DC power only; Free BNC to RCA adapters
ProductInfo.Name: Masione 4 PACK 100ft security camera bnc video power cable extension wire cord for cctv dvr surveillance system
